DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study define dose Phase II study investigate safety tolerability intravenous administration recombinant soluble human Angiotensin Converting Enzyme 2 healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Study APN01 ( Recombinant Human Angiotensin Converting Enzyme 2 )
DOC.detailed_description: APN01-1-01 placebo control double blinded Phase I study composed single dose , dose escalation part follow multiple dosage part . The first four cohort ( four individual ) receive 100 , 200 , 400 800 µg/kg APN01 i.v . placebo . Cohorts 5 6 ( three individual ) receive three six i.v . APN01 administration daily , respectively . Planned dosage multiple dose part 400 µg/kg .
DOC.criteria: Male female Age ≥18 year Use acceptable form birth control Willing comply study protocol No significant background illness Signed informed consent form Significant hematological , renal , hepatic , metabolic , psychiatric pulmonary disease . Heart disease elevate blood pressure . Any significant disease could interfere subject 's ability complete protocol History alcohol drug abuse Abnormal urinalysis Pregnant lactate female subject Use anticoagulant antihypertensive drug , particularly drug interfere reninangiotensinaldosterone system , Obesity anorexia ( BMI < 18 > 30 ) History malignancy , except basal cell carcinoma skin , Known history human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B hepatitis C infection positive serology test study screening procedure ( except indicate immunization ) Participation clinical trial within last 30 day Any follow laboratory abnormality : WBC 15 % outside normal limit Hemoglobin 15 % outside normal limit Platelets 15 % outside normal limit Aspartate transferase ( AST ) alanine transferase ( ALT ) 15 % outside normal limit Alkaline phosphatase 15 % outside normal limit Urea 15 % outside normal limit Creatinine 15 % outside normal limit .
